title: CINEMATIC EMOTIONAL AMBIENT GUITAR
description: High-Quality Original Music from Professional Composers, designed for use in Video Games. Features 12 Original tracks, converted into 195 sound files, tailor-made for Royalty-Free use in Video Games.
longDescription:
VIdeo Walkthrough


Soundcloud Preview


Cinematic Emotional Ambient Guitar is a High-Quality Music pack made by Pro Composers, Instrumentalists, and Producers, specially edited and curated for Video Games. The HUGE collection of 195 wav files and loops gives you full creative control over the music in your gaming product, like having the music producer in your back pocket, the same way as TV/Film producers and directors do.


========================

MASSIVE CONTENT

========================


From 12 original genuine artistic tracks, written by Pro Composers and all featuring Live Instruments, there are 195 Musical Elements for your project, including 60 seamless loops, with a massive 5 hours 25 minutes of play time! These can be used for different levels, menu screens, cutaways, and expansion content. 


========================

ADAPTABLE AND VERSATILE

========================


It’s likely the game you’re planning has different textures in different levels, bright echoing tones needed in some spaces, more mysterious melodies in others, then this pack gives you 60 1-2 minute loops to accomplish that. You can fill the still void of a menu screen with more melodic music, cut to a “pad only” mix in a dark level to give that feeling of horror, or use sparse single guitar solos on another.


========================

PRO LEVEL MUSIC, INDIE BUDGET

========================


The Music in this Pack has been made by Creators with masses of experience writing Music for High End Media, and has already clocked up thousands of hours on television broadcasts all over the world. The Quality of this Music product, greatly increases the Quality of your Games.


========================

STYLE AND FEEL 

========================


The music is in this pack is a mix of uplifting and dreamy tracks, and dark and pensive. It is all ambient, cinematic, atmospheric, and sparse, filled with emotional live guitars, swirling atmospheric pads, and bright glocks. Great for building tension and mystery in puzzle, adventures, strategy, and platformers, light relief in transitions and casual games, and romance for character-based RPG’s.


Check the full tracks on Soundcloud : https://soundcloud.com/matt-harvey-vgm/sets/cinematic-emotional-ambient


========================

FULL COLLECTION DETAILS

========================


• 195 original high-quality WAV tracks (16-bit / 44.1 kHz)

• 60 seamless loops based on the main version, all at least 1-2 minutes long.

• 5 hrs 25 mins of music

• 3.18 GB of music

• Unlimited Royalty-Free license


========================

ABOUT THE COMPOSER :

========================


Matt Harvey has created production music for High End Media Productions for over a decade. He has written for 1000’s of television shows, movies, online streamers, and adverts. His music is heard all over the world by millions. He has a dedicated studio using £1000’s worth of equipment, guitars, hardware, and software. These music products are crafted by a dedicated professional with years of experience.


This collection is a great way to get Top Level Music into your project on an Indie Budget.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 195

Number of Audio Cues: 195

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1Khz 16-bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided : 325

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Important/Additional Notes: All artwork created and used under license by Midjourney AI. Music contains samples used under license.
